ol.li:
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] templateId ( ) such that it
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @root="2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.120"
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:10399)/@code="67533-0" Extremities assessment (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:10400)

MAY contain exactly one [1..1] targetSiteCode (CONF:10402), which SHALL be selected from ValueSet ExtremityFindingLocation 2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.11.37 STATIC (CONF:10401)
NEMSIS Trace: EExam.15

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value with data type CD, which SHALL be selected from ValueSet ExtremitiesAssessmentFinding 2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.11.36 STATIC (CONF:10403)
NEMSIS Trace: EExam.16

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] effectiveTime
NEMSIS Trace: EExam.03
Contains exactly one [1..1] @classCode with data type ActClassObservation
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:10399)/@code="67533-0" Extremities assessment (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:10400)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] effectiveTime
NEMSIS Trace: EExam.03

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value with data type CD, which SHALL be selected from ValueSet ExtremitiesAssessmentFinding 2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.11.36 STATIC (CONF:10403)
NEMSIS Trace: EExam.16

MAY contain exactly one [1..1] targetSiteCode (CONF:10402), which SHALL be selected from ValueSet ExtremityFindingLocation 2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.11.37 STATIC (CONF:10401)
NEMSIS Trace: EExam.15

body.codeblock: <observation xmlns="urn:hl7-org:v3" moodCode="EVN"> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.120"/> <id root="MDHT" extension="860352046"/> <code code="67533-0" codeSystem="2.16.840.1.113883.6.1" codeSystemName="LOINC" displayName="Extremities assessment"/> <effectiveTime> <low value="2013"/> <high value="2013"/> </effectiveTime> <targetSiteCode codeSystem="2.16.840.1.113883.6.1" codeSystemName="LOINC"/> </observation>
